properties.name: checkmk-api.base-url
properties.description: Base URL of the Checkmk API endpoint

properties.name: checkmk-api.site-ID
properties.description: Checkmk site identifier used for API requests

properties.name: checkmk-api.user
properties.description: Username for Checkmk API authentication (automation user)

properties.name: checkmk-api.password
properties.description: Password or automation secret for Checkmk API authentication

properties.name: checkmk-api.SSL-enable
properties.description: Enable or disable SSL certificate validation for HTTPS connections

properties.name: checkmk-api.timeout-seconds
properties.description: Connection and read timeout in seconds for API requests
